name: Moonshards of Sacrimore
overview: Moonshards of Sacrimore is a text adventure for the 128K ZX Spectrum. It was developed by Mark Beech and published by Global Games in 1989. Plot: On his sixth night in a small boat, adventurer Brion Faldock's weary eyes spy something shimmering on the river bed. As he lifts up what appears to be a cold white stone, cut into a crescent shape, a terrible weariness falls over him. He awakes in a stinking black creek and with your help will complete what is to be an epic quest.
